기업
기업 홈페이지
기업
[NEWLINE]"If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business."[NEWLINE] - B.C. Forbes[NEWLINE]
무역과 상업은 고대부터 문명의 중심지 역할을 해왔습니다. 기업은 단체 또는 단일 그룹이 단일 독립체로 활동할 수 있도록 권한을 부여하는 현대적 조합입니다. 기업은 오늘날 사회에서 무역과 영향력을 촉진하는 가장 큰 조력자가 되었습니다. 문명 V에서 기업은 문명의 부를 강화하고 문명에 강력한 무역 혜택을 제공합니다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]기업을 설립하려면 특정 자원에 대한 글로벌 독점을 확보해야 하며, 기업 본부를 설립해야 합니다. 기업이 설립된 후 당신 문명의 도시에 오피스를 건설하고 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]교역로를 통해 다른 문명의 도시에 프랜차이즈를 건설할 수 있습니다.
독점
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_MONOPOLY}
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]독점[ENDCOLOR]은 Community Balance Patch에서 추가된 새로운 게임 플레이 요소 중 하나입니다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]글로벌 사치 자원 독점[ENDCOLOR]: the essence of the Monopoly system is expansion: as your empire expands throughout the game (either through combat or settlement), be on the lookout for Luxury resources that you already have copies of. AS you collect more and more copies of the same Luxury Resources, the percentage of global resources you control goes up. If this value goes over 50% (i.e. you control more than 50% of the world's supply of any resource), you gain a Global Monopoly over that Resource. Each Global Monopoly has a unique bonus - some grant additional yields to your tiles, whereas others boost City yields by a set percentage (see the Resource section of the Civilopedia for details).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]글로벌 전략 자원 독점[ENDCOLOR]: Strategic Resources operate the same way as Luxury Resources with regards to Monopolies, with one major exception. Due to the vast abundance of these resources, a true 50% Monopoly can be quite difficult. As a result, Strategic Resources have two tiers: 'Strategic' Monopolies and 'True' Monopolies. Strategic Monopolies occur at 25%, and generate special combat bonuses (such as increased health regeneration or increase defense). True Monopolies occur at 50% and, like Luxury Monopolies, they generate bonuses to City and/or tile yields.
자원 독점이란 무엇입니까?
기업 본부
기업
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION}
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]기업[ENDCOLOR]은 Community Balance Patch에서 추가된 새로운 게임 플레이 요소 중 하나입니다. They can have a great impact on your empire's economic development, especially in the later part of a game.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]기업 설립[ENDCOLOR]: There are seven distinct Corporations in the game, each of which becomes available once you have researched the Corporations Technology during the Modern Age. Each Corporation has a specific set of Resource Monopolies that it relies upon - if you do not have at least one of these Resource Monopolies, you will not be able to found the Corporation. Once these two requirements are met, you need to construct the 'Headquarters' of the Corporation in one of your Cities. These buildings are World Wonders, so only one player in the world may found each Corporation! Furthermore, once you have founded a Corporation, you cannot found another one, so make sure you like the one you pick![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]기업 오피스 설립[ENDCOLOR]: Once you have founded your Corporation, you can begin establishing Corporate Offices in each of your Cities. These buildings come with special bonuses similar to your Corporation's Headquarters, and are thus worthwhile to construct on their own. Most bonuses from Corporations scale with the number of Cities you own, so larger empires benefit greatly from founding a Corporation and building as many Offices as possible!
기업이란 무엇입니까?
기업 확장
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_SPREADING}
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]기업 확장[ENDCOLOR]: to foreign cities is an essential element of reaping the most benefit from your Corporation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]능동적인 확산: Corporations actively spread their influence via owned Trade Routes, but only if the origin City (your City) has a Corporate Office in it. If your City has a Corporate Office, and you send a Trade Route from that City to a foreign City, a Corporate 'Franchise' will be built in that foreign City when the Trade Route completes. There is also a random chance (~5%) that a Franchise will be created in a nearby Foreign city each turn, if you are currently trading with that Civilization. You can only spread your Corporation to each foreign City once, and you cannot have more Franchises than the maximum number of Trade Routes you can support.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]수동적인 확산[ENDCOLOR]: Corporations passively spread their influence via foreign Trade Routes, but only if the destination City (your City) has a Corporate Office in it. If your City has a Corporate Office, and another player sends a Trade Route to that City from one of their Cities, a Corporate 'Franchise' will be built in the foreign City when their Trade Route completes. Your Corporation can only spread to each foreign City once.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]기업 확장 혜택[ENDCOLOR]: As listed in the details of each Corporation, the spread of your Corporation to foreign cities has a direct impact on the productivity of your Corporate Offices. For every 'Franchise' of your Corporation in a foreign City, your Corporate Offices gain unique bonuses, be it additional City yields, free resources, or improved Trade Route yields. Furthermore, many Corporations gain additional bonuses if you send Trade Routes to foreign Cities that already have your Corporation in them. Make sure to study the details of your Corporation once you have founded it so that you can maximize your benefit![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]기업 관리[ENDCOLOR]: As your Corporation grows, it can be hard to keep up with where you have Franchises, and where you have Offices. Never fear! In the Economic Overview panel, you can find detailed information on your Corporation in the bottom-left corner. There, you can see the total number of Offices and Corporations you currently control, as well as drop-down lists of the locations of all Corporate Offices and Franchises, as well as the size of foreign Corporations. In addition to these elements, you can also find information about your Corporation while choosing a destination for your Trade Routes. Each City with a Franchise in it is clearly indicated.
내 기업을 어떻게 확장시키나요?
기업 종류
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_TYPES}
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]기업 종류[ENDCOLOR]: there are seven Corporations avaialable in the Community Balance Patch. Each of these can only be constructed once (and only one per player), so choose wisely! For more on this, see the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Corporations[ENDCOLOR] Tab of the Civilopedia.
내 기업을 어떻게 확장시키나요?

기업 & 독점
기업 설립
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_FOUNDING}
In order to establish a Corporation, you need to construct its associated Headquarters in one of your cities, and the Corporation must not be actively founded by another civilization. Headquarters may only be established after you have a Global Monopoly on one of its required Monopoly Resources. Once you've constructed the Headquarters, you will automatically found the Corporation and immediately receive its Corporation benefits. You also receive a free Office in the city that constructed it. You can only establish one Corporation at a time, so choose carefully!
기업을 설립하려면 어떻게 해야하나요?
기업 파괴
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_DESTROYING}
When a city that has constructed a Corporation Headquarters is acquired or destroyed through any means by another civilization, that Corporation is immediately destroyed. All Offices and Franchises around the world are immediately closed, and the founding Civilization immediately loses all benefits from that Corporation. It is extremely important to protect your Corporation, as you will lose all of your progress in spreading that Corporation![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A destroyed Corporation immediately becomes available to be founded again by any civilization in the world. There is no restriction in the number of times a Corporation may be established in a game.
기업을 파괴하려면 어떻게 해야하나요?
오피스
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_OFFICES}
Offices can be established in any of your empire's cities after you've established a Corporation. Offices allow you to spread your Corporation through [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes. Each [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route you establish from a city with an Office to a foreign city without your Corporation's Franchise will spread your Corporation's Franchise to that city at the completion of the [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route. In addition to a base effect, each Office has a benefit that stacks based on the number of Franchises you've established in foreign cities. The more Offices you own in the empire, the faster your Corporation can spread. Spread your Corporation to enhance its benefit to your Civilization!
오피스란 무엇입니까?
프랜차이즈
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_FRANCHISES}
Franchises cannot be constructed in any city. Instead they are created after a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route from a city you own with an Office to a foreign city that does not already contain your Corporation's Franchise is completed. Franchises increase the Empire's overall Office benefit, so use them to strengthen your Corporation's effect. You can only build a maximum number of Franchises, determined by the size of the map, the number of [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes you can establish, and any bonuses from any [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies you have unlocked.
프랜차이즈란 무엇입니까?
독점
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_MONOPOLIES}
Monopolies represent the amount of a particular Luxury or Strategic Resource you own vs. the amount of that resource on the map. As you obtain more copies of a resource, your Monopoly Percentage will increase. If you obtain 50% or more of a Monopoly over a resource, you obtain a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Global Monopoly[ENDCOLOR] over that resource. Obtaining a Global Monopoly grants a unique bonus per resource, so you should make it a priority to obtain Monopolies over as many Resources as possible.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Due to the vast abundance of Strategic Resources, it can be difficult to obtain a 50% Monopoly over a Strategic Resource. Because of this, you can also obtain a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT] Strategic Monopoly[ENDCOLOR] at 25% Monopoly, which grants a special combat bonus (different for each resource). You can still achieve a Global Monopoly at 50% Monopoly for a Strategic Resource.
독점이란 무엇입니까?
기업 확장
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_SPREAD}
You can spread your Corporation through [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes from a city with your Corporation's Office built to a foreign city without a Corporation Franchise built. At the completion of the [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route, a Franchise will be constructed. There is also a random chance every turn (around 5%) that a Franchise will be constructed in a nearby foriegn City, if you are trading with that Civilization already.
내 기업을 어떻게 확장시키나요?
자원 보너스
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_RESOURCE_BONUS}
Most Corporations have a resource bonus which applies to all Cities with a Corporation Franchise. Each resource bonus provides a bonus to a specific yield, such as [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, or [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.
자원 보너스란 무엇입니까?
오피스 보너스
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_OFFICE_BONUS}
Your Corporation Offices receive incremental affects the more Franchises you establish in foreign cities, so be sure to keep spreading your Corporation to reap its benefits!
오피스 보너스란 무엇입니까?
교역로 보너스
{TXT_KEY_TOPIC_CORPORATION_TRADE_ROUTE_BONUS}
All Corporations provide some benefit to your [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes. These bonuses generally affect your [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade benefits to cities that have your Corporation Franchise already established, but they may also grant some sort of special benefit (like increase trade distance, or invulnerable trade units).
교역로 보너스란 무엇입니까?

독점 & 기업
기업
The word "corporation" derives from corpus, the Latin word for body, or a body of people. By the time of Justinian (reigned 527–565), Roman Law recognized a range of corporate entities under the names universitas, corpus or collegium. These included the state itself (the populus Romanus), municipalities, and such private associations as sponsors of a religious cult, burial clubs, political groups, and guilds of craftsmen or traders. Such bodies commonly had the right to own property and make contracts, to receive gifts and legacies, to sue and be sued, and, in general, to perform legal acts through representatives. Private associations were granted designated privileges and liberties by the emperor.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]국유화[ENDCOLOR]: 각 기업 오피스가 프랜차이즈로 간주되고 프랜차이즈를 설립한 도시의 기업 [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE]교역로 보너스가 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]두 배[ENDCOLOR] 증가합니다. 다른 문명의 프랜차이즈가 더이상 당신 문명의 회사에 혜택을 제공하지 않습니다. 당신의 문명은 더이상 다른 문명에 프랜차이즈를 설립할 수 없고 다른 문명의 기업 또한 당신의 도시에 프랜차이즈를 설립할 수 없습니다. 모든 기업 오피스의 [ICON_RESEARCH]과학이 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]2[ENDCOLOR] 증가합니다.
국유화 2
Nationalization is the process of taking a private industry or private assets into public ownership by a national government or state. Nationalization usually refers to private assets, but may also mean assets owned by lower levels of government, such as municipalities, being transferred to be the state. The opposite of nationalization is usually privatization or de-nationalization, but may also be municipalization. Industries that are usually subject to nationalization include transport, communications, energy, banking and natural resources.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]다국적주의[ENDCOLOR]: 매 턴 다른 문명의 도시에 기업 프랜차이즈가 나타날 확률이 [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]5%[ENDCOLOR]에서 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]15%[ENDCOLOR]로 증가합니다. 글로벌 프랜차이즈 한도가 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]25%[ENDCOLOR] 증가합니다. 모든 기업 오피스의 [ICON_CULTURE]문화가 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]2[ENDCOLOR] 증가합니다.
다국적주의 2
Transnationalism as an economic process involves the global reorganization of the production process, in which various stages of the production of any product can occur in various countries, typically with the aim of minimizing costs. Economic transnationalism, commonly known as Globalization, was spurred in the latter half of the 20th century by the development of the internet and wireless communication, as well as the reduction in global transportation costs caused by containerization. Multinational corporations could be seen as a form of transnationalism, in that they seek to minimize costs, and hence maximize profits, by organizing their operations in the most efficient means possible irrespective of political boundaries.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]신디칼리즘[ENDCOLOR]: 당신의 문명이 최소 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]유명한[ENDCOLOR] 도시에서는 기업 프랜차이즈가 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]두 배[ENDCOLOR]로 계산되고, 이러한 추가 프랜차이즈는 글로벌 프랜차이즈 한도에 포함되지 않습니다. 다른 문명에 추가 프랜차이즈를 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]5개[ENDCOLOR] 더 건설할 수 있습니다. 모든 기업 오피스의 [ICON_PRODUCTION]생산이 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]2[ENDCOLOR] 증가합니다.
신디칼리즘
National syndicalism is an adaptation of syndicalism to suit the social agenda of integral nationalism. National syndicalism suggests that the people must defend themselves through the development of Syndicalist sections into massive economic worker movements. These should take immediate action to expropriate the capitalists. These should also take direct action to let the workers lead the production and to form peoples communes. National syndicalism seeks out principled reasons for direct economic action and denounces parliamentary action by representatives. The goal is not to make capitalism bearable, but the realisation of a free Nationalist and Socialist nation. National syndicalism aims to move the attention from the political terrain to the economic terrain. It wants the socialisation from the basis: a system of distribution from local units, in consultation with the National federation, on the fundament of a production and consumption statistic. As well as the organisation of the production by national industrial federations.

시드 무역 본부 2
A corporation is a company or group of people authorized to act as a single entity (legally a person) and recognized as such in law. Early incorporated entities were established by charter (i.e. by an ad hoc act granted by a monarch or passed by a parliament or legislature). Most jurisdictions now allow the creation of new corporations through registration. Corporations come in many different types but are usually divided by the law of the jurisdiction where they are chartered into two kinds: by whether or not they can issue stock, or by whether or not they are for profit.
Construct this building in one of your cities to found the Trader Sid's Corporation. See the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Corporations[ENDCOLOR] section of the Civilopedia for more information.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Remember that each Civilization may only found [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]one[ENDCOLOR] Corporation, so make sure the benefits are applicable to your Victory Strategy!

현재 오피스 보너스: {1_String}
조르지오 아르미에 본부 2
A corporation is a company or group of people authorized to act as a single entity (legally a person) and recognized as such in law. Early incorporated entities were established by charter (i.e. by an ad hoc act granted by a monarch or passed by a parliament or legislature). Most jurisdictions now allow the creation of new corporations through registration. Corporations come in many different types but are usually divided by the law of the jurisdiction where they are chartered into two kinds: by whether or not they can issue stock, or by whether or not they are for profit.
Construct this building in one of your cities to found the Giorgio Armeier Corporation. See the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Corporations[ENDCOLOR] section of the Civilopedia for more information.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Remember that each Civilization may only found [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]one[ENDCOLOR] Corporation, so make sure the benefits are applicable to your Victory Strategy!
조르지오 아르미에 기업을 설립합니다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_YELLOW]조르지오 아르미에 오피스[ENDCOLOR]를 무료로 제공하고 소유한 도시에 조르지오 아르미에 오피스를 건설할 수 있는 능력을 해제합니다.

Most jurisdictions now allow the creation of new corporations through registration. To construct this building in a foreign City, send a Trade Route from an owned City with a Civilized Jewelers Office in it to a foreign City. When the Trade Route is complete, the building will automatically be constructed.

시빌 보석 오피스 2
A corporation is a company or group of people authorized to act as a single entity (legally a person) and recognized as such in law. Early incorporated entities were established by charter (i.e. by an ad hoc act granted by a monarch or passed by a parliament or legislature). Most jurisdictions now allow the creation of new corporations through registration. Corporations come in many different types but are usually divided by the law of the jurisdiction where they are chartered into two kinds: by whether or not they can issue stock, or by whether or not they are for profit.
When a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route between a foreign City and this City completes, a Civilized Jewelers Franchise is constructed in the foreign City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Civilized Jewelers cannot be sold or destroyed by the player, and increases the [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person rate of all Civilized Jewelers's Offices by +5%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You cannot have more Franchises than your Franchise Limit (see the Corporation and Monopolies Overview for more on this).
